summary: Water quality parameters are stable and within optimal ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and the selected plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 6.5 to 7.5 for optimal growth.
Keep TDS between 300-500 ppm for healthy fish and plant growth.
Maintain water temperature between 24-28°C for optimal tilapia health.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.035 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 327.973 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.369 / 23.56 / 28.56 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
